alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 11:10PM EDT until August 25 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Lake County in northeastern Ohio... * Until midnight EDT. * At 1110 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Willowick, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Painesville, Willowick, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Madison, Perry, Timberlake, Lakeline, Wickliffe, Willoughby Hills, Mentor-On-The-Lake, Kirtland, Mayfield, Gates Mills, Montville, North Perry and Thompson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
